'''MC Studio''' is an integrated development tool featuring a developer launcher, map editor, level editor, logic editor, effects editor, and cloud testing platform.<ref>{{citation|url=https://mc.163.com/dev/mcmanual/mc-dev/mcguide/12-%E5%85%A5%E9%97%A8%E6%95%99%E7%A8%8B/20-MC%20Studio%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E8%AF%B4%E6%98%8E.html|title=MC Studio Instructions}}</ref>
